content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ah, Ms. Müller, thank you for considering my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay up to 500 Euros per month. However, I want to negotiate the price with you. Can you give me an initial offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Well, Ms. Müller, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a starting price of 550 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing any potential concessions or additional terms that you may be interested in.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think that's too high. Can we lower the price?

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Therefore, I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I would appreciate it if you could give me a counteroffer.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Of course, Ms. Müller, I understand your concerns. While my initial proposal was based on the market value of the apartment, I am willing to be flexible and work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Based on your budget of up to 500 Euros per month, I would like to propose a counteroffer of 450 Euros per month. This price reflects the size and location of the apartment, while also taking into account the needs of a student tenant.

I hope this counteroffer is more in line with your expectations, and I am open to discussing any additional terms or concessions that you may be interested in.
name: Heinrich Heine
